name: okcoders-website
description: web app for doing more complicated stuff on the ok coders website

scripts.install-all: npm install && concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.start-all: npm run install-all && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd db && ./start-and-seed.sh" "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
